resources.string: Welcome To Memorization Master\nA Game where you need to click on the buttons in exact order as they were shown
Welcome To Push the Box\nA Game where you control the character to push the boxes to red destination point

"Challenge your memorization!
Please try to remember as much numbers in correct order at displaying time.
When it's your turn, click on the tiles in order you just saw in order to earn marks.
Beware! If you choose crazy mode, the tiles displayed orange are just there to confuse you!You should ignore them and only click on tiles showed in green!"
